name: Visitors Right Now Counter
author: Visitors Right Now

sections.description:
Plugin to show the current active visitors on the website, the daily, monthly and all time visitors

FUNCTIONS

  • Plugin counter of current users on site
  • Ability to change title
  • Change the background and text colors

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Select ‘Add new’ in the ‘Plugins’ menu to find and install the current Visitors Right Now plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.3.3

  • Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.5

1.3.2

  • Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.4

1.3.1

  • Made some changes to improve compliance with WP requirements

1.3.0

  • Added functionality to get monthly, daily and total visitors

1.2.0

  • Extend compatibility to WordPress 5.3.0

1.0.0

  • First release.

short_description: Shows the number of users on the site
